Here I must determine how far apart Aman starts behind Debra since only distances would allow me compare speeds without information about times . So let k represent such separation length , so using proportional reasoning based upon known values where d stands as unknown total trip distance while u*d denotes respective constants used herein ; namely initial velocities relative to final state described hence yielding equations thusly :-\\begin{align*}&u_A*k=b \\ &m*\bar{v}_D*(c

subanswer.text: First calculate v_{avg}(A)=$\dfrac{(km+kc)}{2}, m\,\overline{v}_{DB}=2(\frac{kc}{2}-bc)$, etc., now solve system $$\begin{cases}\frac{mb}{\frac{(km+kc)}{2}}<\frac{2mc}{(c+kb)}-\frac{ck+cb}{c}\\ c>\frac{kb}{b-k},\end{cases}$$as follows$$\begin{aligned}&bm<(mk+k)+2(mc-kc)-kc-kb=(m+2k)(c)\\ &\Rightarrow b<\frac{(m+2k)(c)}{k}>b+\frac{2kc}{k}=b+2c\\&\Rightarrow\; k>\frac{b}{2}\,\text{and}\, bc<\frac{kb}{b-k}\\&\Longrightarrow\; -\frac{b}{2}>\min\{-\frac{b}{2};\frac{-b}{b-k}\}=\max\big\{\tfrac{b}{2k}-\tfrac{b}{b},\, \tfrac{b}{2k}\big\}\leq\tfrac{b}{2}+kc,\;\blacksquare\end{aligned}$$Thus angle bracket expressions may not always give solutions satisfying condition mentioned above.<|end_of_document|>

ost_step.1: To calculate the average speed, we need to divide the displacement ($d$) by the time elapsed ($t$).

direct_answer.text: To determine who ran faster based on graphs without knowing any data like angle measures etc., let us try calculating each one directly using distances along both axes divided by times taken as shown above.. Evelyn runs ((5 - (-2)) / 4 = 1.75 mph.) Briana does not cover much ground over her short duration so she cannot possibly beat either Angela nor Debra since hers is closer together... Also see how quickly Carla covers more terrain! Overall it looks likely debra might come out ahead here having covered almost twice what angela did within approximately half the amount of time.... And indeed doing some quick calculations confirms my guess!... I get evelyns avg.speed=5miles/(hour*timeelapsedinhours)=2.5mi/(hr)(day)--carlas=.94mileperminute--debras~1.3mi/min.--angulasspeedsoundsbestataround1.2 mi/min though!! :)
